home.title: Enklave - Collaborative family and couple management software
home.description: Enklave is a collaborative family and couple management software with secure file storage, shopping lists, and organization tools.

hero.title: Simplify your family's digital life
hero.description: Enklave is the collaborative family and couple management software that helps you organize, share, and manage your daily life together.

problem.title: Family coordination is getting harder
problem.description: Managing family life across multiple apps and platforms creates chaos. Important documents get lost, shopping lists are forgotten, and communication breaks down.
problem.solution: There's a better way. A way that puts you in control.

scattered.title: Scattered Information

forgotten.title: Forgotten Tasks
forgotten.description: Shopping lists, appointments, and family tasks get lost in messaging apps

privacy.title: Privacy Concerns
privacy.description: Your family's personal data stored on servers you don't control

features.title: Everything your family needs, in one place
features.description: Discover the features that make Enklave the perfect solution for family collaboration and organization.
features.ctaText: Ready to secure your digital life?

storage.title: Secure file storage
storage.description: Store and organize important family documents, photos, and media with end-to-end encryption and organized folder structures.

lists.title: Shared shopping lists
lists.description: Create and share shopping lists with family members. Real-time updates ensure everyone stays in sync.

notes.title: Family notes
notes.description: Keep track of important information, schedules, and reminders that everyone in the family can access.

sharing.title: Smart sharing
sharing.description: Share files and information with specific family members with granular permissions and access controls.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-platform access
crossPlatform.description: Access your family's information from any device - web browser, desktop app, or mobile (coming soon).

security.title: Privacy & Security
security.description: Self-host on your own infrastructure with full source code transparency. Your family data stays private.

socialProof.title: Trusted by families worldwide
socialProof.description: Join families who have simplified their digital life with Enklave
